Title: The Perils of Gwendoline in the Land of the Yik Yak
Writer: Just Jaeckin (screenplay), John Willie (comic strip by: The Adventures of Sweet Gwendolyn)
Actors: Tawny Kitaen, Brent Huff, Zabou Breitman, Bernadette Lafont
Plot: Gwendoline arrives in China in a box, and is helped out of her immediate predicament by a female contact and a devil-may-care adventurer. She's on a mission to find her father, who was last...
